translations: n.千年；一千（人或物）；千禧年说的支持者
adj.千人的；千年的；千物构成的

phrs.translation: 千禧系列, 系列, 爱彼千禧, 一千年的

sentences.sentence: Lightly, the small millenary town shakes off the dust of its history; Brilliantly, it chants a merry song of youth.
sentences.translation: 千年小镇轻轻抖落了历史的埃尘，焕然之间吟唱出了青春的欢歌。

sentences.sentence: After the millenary of tentative idea, mankind can roam wantonly in infinite universe, is that to be so secret, so magical!
sentences.translation: 设想千年以后人类可以在无限的宇宙中任意遨游，那是多么奥妙，多么神奇！

sentences.sentence: Firstly: In order to overlook the millenary trees of the civic square that is in front of the site; to rise the library 1,6 meters over street level.
sentences.translation: 首先：为了眺望场地前市民广场的千年古树：将图书馆沿着街道层高抬高1.6米。
